post.summary:
The legacy Disposals app retrieves a list of available disposals from the database for display on the initial Disposals screen.
It makes 3 calls to get Disposal destination information for display, DSPGetDefaultDestination, DSPgetDestinationCount and DSPGetDestinations.
The call to DSPGetDestinationCount is only used by STEP for determining how many pages of items there are for display.
This function is not needed by the Android client.
The default destination was only used by the legacy app if the user hit ENTER on the list Destinations without selecting a destination sequence number.
The android client should not need to call this function either.
There is an opportunity for an orchestration to open a new Destination and verify it downs not exceed the maximum.This would combine calls to DSPSetDestination and DSPFinishDestination.

530.description:
Unexpected ROSS POC and RfCOM Error
POC/RF Error IDs:
1018 input missing
2004 database execute error
2006 database index error
3032 error in disposals destination
10001 inventory in progress generated by WebAPI, not returned by RFControlCOM
10002 exceeded maximum bags for destination generated by WebAPI, not returned by RFControlCOM 10003 failed to create Disposal Bag for destination generated by WebAPI, not returned by RFControlCOM

post.summary:
In the legacy app, when the user chooses to start a new bag, the legacy app checks to see if it has a non-zero DocumentID.
If it does it calls DSPFinishBag, and UTLPrintReport in succession.
This new orchestration would call those 2 RFControlCOM functions, returning only a status.

post.summary:
Disposals only prints labels for some BrokenPack items and Hazmat items.
To print a label in the legacy app, the Reticket App is activated to print a ticket and then function DSPTicket is called.
A new orchestration is needed to call UTLPrintLabel and DSPTicket.

post.summary:
Combine calls to ITMGetMarkdownInfo, UTLPrintLabel, ITMAddSkuLog, MDAddMkdnSKU, and ITMUpdateSkuLogStatus into one WebAPI call.
A label will only be printed for specific markdown types and price conditions.
The ProcessMarkdownItemAndPrintLabel API will open new markdown document if parameter MarkdownDocId is zero (0)

200.description: Returns request id, with ProcessMarkdownItemAndPrintLabelRes data structure

post.summary:
Combine calls to ITMGetMarkdownInfo, UTLPrintLabel, ITMAddSkuLog, MDAddMkdnSKU, and ITMUpdateSkuLogStatus into one WebAPI call.
The ProcessMarkdownItemAndPrintLabel API will open new markdown document if parameter MarkdownDocId is zero (0)

200.description: Returns request id, with ProcessMarkdownItemRes data structure

530.description:
Unexpected ROSS POC and RfCOM Error
POC/RF Error IDs:
1006 - Invalid SKU
1007 - Item not found in POS
1019 - Invalid Date
1026 - Audit Count Must Be Greater Than 0
1027- Invalid subcategory
1501 - Memory allocation failed
2001 - NULL value where not expected
2002 - DB connect failed
2003 - SQL Prepare error
2004 - DB Execute failed
2006 - SQLBindParameter or BindCol error
2012 - Error calling SQLGetData
2051 - Could not link to POS interface
2052 - Error retrieving data from POS
2053 - Exception thrown in POS interface
2600 - Barcode Invalid

post.summary: Combine calls to ITMAddSkuLog, UTLPrintLabel and ITMUpdateSkuLogStatus into one WebAPI call when the user chooses to print additional labels. The API support LabelType:Markdown, PriceAdj, Recall and MgrMarkdown Notes: ScanType: Should hold MarkdownType for labels: Markdown, MgrMarkdown and PriceAdj
post.description:
Sample request:

    POST simapi/Markdown/PrintMarkdownLabel
    {
        "LabelType": "PriceAdj",
        "PrintCopies": 1,
        "Sku": "400000322247",
        "Description": "14KT LEMON QRZ",
        "DivisionNumber": "1111",
        "DepartmentNumber": "1111",
        "MarkdownDocId": 123,
        "SkuType": 1,
        "SubDivision" : "23"
        "ClassNumber": "1234",
        "PriceForDisplay": "$36.21",
        "PriceBarcode": "4000003222473621",
        "OldPrice": "36.21",
        "NewPrice": "36.21",
        "OriginPrice": "36.21"
    }

200.description: Returns request id, with ProcessMarkdownItemAndPrintLabelRes data structure

530.description:
Unexpected ROSS POC and RfCOM Error
POC/RF Error IDs:
1501 - Memory allocation failed
2004 - DB Execute failed
2006 - SQLBindParameter|or BindCol error

Prints Label receiving only the SKU.

Return status indicating if label print succeeded.

post.summary:
Prints Label according to markdown type and app making request, the optionally updates the SKU log depending on parameters passed.
Return status indicating if label print succeeded.
The API support LabelType:RtktPriceAdj, RtktNoAction, PriceAdj, RtktMarkdown and Recall
post.description:
Sample request:

    POST simapi/Reticket/PrintReticketLabel
    {
        "LabelType": "PriceAdj",
        "PrintCopies": 1,
        "Sku": "400000322247",
        "Description": "14KT LEMON QRZ",
        "DivisionNumber": "1111",
        "DepartmentNumber": "1111",
        "UpdateSkuLog": true,
        "ScanType" : "RM",
        "ClassNumber": "1234",
        "PriceForDisplay": "$36.21",
        "PriceBarcode": "4000003222473621",
        "NewPrice": "36.21",
        "OriginPrice": "36.21"
    }

530.description:
Unexpected ROSS POC and RfCOM Error
POC/RF Error IDs:
1501 - Memory allocation failed
2006 - SQLBindParameter|or BindCol error
2004 - DB Execute failed
2006 - SQLBindParameter|or BindCol error

ONLY FOR DEVELOPMENT

post.summary:
Combine calls to ITMAddSkuLog, UTLPrintLabel and ITMUpdateSkuLogStatus into one WebAPI call when the user chooses to print additional labels.
The API support LabelType:Markdown, PriceAdj, Recall, MgrMarkdown, RtktPriceAdj, RtktNoAction and RtktMarkdown
Notes:
    MarkdownDocId: Applicable for label types: Markdown, MgrMarkdown and PriceAdj
    UpdateSkuLog: Applicable for label types: RtktPriceAdj, RtktNoAction and RtktMarkdown
    ScanType: Should hold MarkdownType for labels: Markdown, MgrMarkdown and PriceAdj
    SkuType: Applicable for label types: Markdown, MgrMarkdown and PriceAdj
post.description:
Sample request:

    POST simapi/Utils/PrintLabelByType
    {
        "LabelType": "PriceAdj",
        "PrintCopies": 1,
        "Sku": "400000322247",
        "Description": "14KT LEMON QRZ",
        "DivisionNumber": "1111",
        "DepartmentNumber": "1111",
        "MarkdownDocId": 123,
        "SkuType": 1,
        "SubDivision" : "23"
        "ClassNumber": "1234",
        "PriceForDisplay": "$36.21",
        "PriceBarcode": "4000003222473621",
        "OldPrice": "36.21",
        "NewPrice": "36.21",
        "OriginPrice": "36.21"
    }

200.description: Returns request id, with ProcessMarkdownItemAndPrintLabelRes data structure

2004 - DB Execute failed
2006 - SQLBindParameter|or BindCol error
